description: Detects a suspicious program execution in a web service root folder (filter out false positives)
false_positives: Tools that include ping or nslookup command invocations
name: Execution in Webserver Root Folder
query: (process.executable:(*\\wwwroot\\* OR *\\wmpub\\* OR *\\htdocs\\*) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*bin\\* OR *\\Tools\\* OR *\\SMSComponent\\*) AND process.parent.executable:*\\services.exe)))
author: Florian Roth
